arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Cardiff as Reds draw Severnside derby 1-1
arts.sum: Produced several important blocks and popped up with some much-needed headers but was perhaps sucked out of position for the late goal. Didn't look as comfortable as the right-sided number 10 as he did on the left against Mark Robins' side but did perk up when moved to the left in the second half.

arts.ttl: Yousef Salech pushing for start after late goal rescues vital point for Cardiff
arts.sum: The 23-year-old striker joined from Swedish club Sirius last month.

Cardiff City: Alnwick ©, Goutas, O’Dowda, Mannsverk (Ashford 81’), El Ghazi (Willock 71’), Bagan, Colwill, Alves, Rinomhota (Ramsey 62’), Ng, Robinson (Salech 71’). Aaron Ramsey slid the ball through for Cian Ashford who fizzed it across the box for Salech finish.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City 1-1 Bristol City: Salech strikes late to salvage point but Bluebirds still in relegation mix
arts.sum: Cardiff rescued a point late on at home to Bristol City in the Severnside Derby

arts.ttl: Cardiff snatch late point against Bristol City
arts.sum: Yousef Salech struck a 90th-minute Severnside derby equaliser to earn relegation-threatened Cardiff a 1-1 Sky Bet Championship draw against play-off hopefuls Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Yousef Salech strikes late to grab vital point for Cardiff
arts.sum: Jason Knight had put Bristol City ahead on the hour.

arts.ttl: Burnley level; Wrexham lead! | EFL LIVE on Sky Sports+
arts.sum: And with the good results we’ve had recently, we’re certainly doing that. "Not much has changed, if you looked at our results before Christmas we were a bit unlucky on a few occasions.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City v Bristol City Live: Start time, TV channel, team news and score updates
arts.sum: Follow live updates from the Cardiff City Stadium as the Bluebirds take on Bristol City in the Severnside Derby

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Cardiff as Manning looks to secure first Severnside derby win
arts.sum: Liam Manning's Robins are looking to secure back-to-back Championship wins for only the second time this season when they face the Bluebirds at the Cardiff City Stadium on Saturday. Wednesday night was both defenders' best game in a few weeks and Manning will be hoping this is the start of a good run of form for both players between now and the end of the Championship season.

arts.ttl: Bristol City team news ahead of Cardiff City as Liam Manning shares Cam Pring injury update
arts.sum: Liam Manning has admitted Bristol City's clash with Cardiff City will likely come too early for Cam Pring to return from injury, with the tight turnaround between games limiting the defender's training time. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.
